inlineScript: function onApply(game, parent) { var effect = parent.createEffect(); effect.getBonuses().addBonus('ArmorSpellFailure', 'Stackable', 7); parent.applyEffect(effect); }
name: Armor Casting II
description: You have practiced casting spells while wearing armor.  You suffer an additional 7% less spell failure from armor and shields for a total of 14%.  Note that that this talent can not reduce your spell failure from armor and shield to less than 0; It does nothing if you are not wearing any armor.
